title: ParaGuide: Guided Diffusion Paraphrasers for Plug-and-Play Textual Style Transfer. (arXiv:2308.15459v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Textual style transfer is the task of transforming stylistic properties of text while preserving meaning. Target "styles" can be defined in numerous ways, ranging from single attributes (e.g, formality) to authorship (e.g, Shakespeare). Previous unsupervised style-transfer approaches generally rely on significant amounts of labeled data for only a fixed set of styles or require large language models. In contrast, we introduce a novel diffusion-based framework for general-purpose style transfer that can be flexibly adapted to arbitrary target styles at inference time. Our parameter-efficient approach, ParaGuide, leverages paraphrase-conditioned diffusion models alongside gradient-based guidance from both off-the-shelf classifiers and strong existing style embedders to transform the style of text while preserving semantic information. tldr: ParaGuide是一种用于通用风格转移的引导性扩散改写器，可以灵活适应任意目标风格，通过梯度引导和改写条件的扩散模型实现文本的风格转变，同时保留语义信息。
en_tdlr: ParaGuide is a guided diffusion paraphraser for general-purpose style transfer that can flexibly adapt to arbitrary target styles. By leveraging gradient guidance and paraphrase-conditioned diffusion models, it transforms the style of text while preserving semantic information.
